title: Recipe Book Application     (Frontend+Backend)
description: The Recipe Book project focuses on simplifying the management of recipes and ingredients Users can add edit and organize recipes.

title: Memory-Game     (Frontend+Database)
description: A Java based memory game project includes multiple levels and a scoreboard to track player performance.

title: Pharmacy Management System     (Frontend+Database)
description: A Pharmacy Management System built using Python and Tkinter enables users to add, update, delete,and search pharmacy items, including name, price, quantity, category, discount.
